							Predictable  Commerce for the Produce Industry.						

Providing unprecedented access to capital, global trading networks, and supply chain visibility.


Talk to an expert
What is Predictable Commerce?

























							Grow More. Risk Less.						


The world’s leading fresh produce companies are partnering with ProducePay
to grow their business.

















							Transform your businesswith predictability. 						


Our groundbreaking Predictable Commerce Programs connect growers, marketers and retailers to build 52 week supply.
Learn more
 
 
 




















							Put capital to work.						


Our financial solutions are designed to help our customers find financial durability in the most volatile industry in the world.













With Quick-Pay
Get faster payments on invoices with flexible terms to drive expansion.
Learn More







With Pre-Season
Get working capital to invest in growing your business on your own terms.
Learn More


























							Trade with confidence.						


Our trading experts facilitate high-quality trades through our global network of verified buyers and sellers.
Talk to an expert


























							Make data driven decisions.						


Our real time market intelligence helps you navigate the unpredictable produce industry.
Get daily insights




















							What our customers are saying.						
















ProducePay provided me with the financial resources to expand and scale my business in ways I hadn’t thought were possible.




Fernando Martinez
Co-Founder & CEO
Berry Sunny International












We found it incredibly difficult to get financing from banks, but ProducePay’s service was easy and fast because they already understood what we needed.




Roberto Ruíz Sánchez
General Manager
Agrícola 76












ProducePay has been a key partner, helping to drive our growth with their working capital solutions. In 5 years, we expect to double or triple our sales.




Luis Mario Morales
General Manager

We started at the farm.

“I come from a fourth generation farming family, and have been in the agriculture industry all my life.
We started ProducePay with the idea of helping the industry and correcting many of the challenges I experienced growing up.”
